Text:
Styvfitturs official homepage is:

http://www.styvfittur.info.se

A new album is coming up soon!

Wow, yet another constructed personality by someone who's done a pretty crappy job :D

First and foremost - the name: (never minding the first name styvfittur i.e. stiffcunt with the "icelandic" ending "-ur") If it's an icelandic man he whouldn't be named gerhardsDOTTIR, since it's the feminine ending (but of course a woman wouldn't be called GERHARDSdottir, since the start of the surname always is the name of the parent of the same sex and gerhard is a male name)... 

And: if it's an icelandic artist - why's his homepage on a Swedish server? ;)
Okay. Have you listened to the music? Quite groovy.
Haven't listened to the music, just dissin' the persona ;)

Styvfitturs new album is now released.
